channel.title: Need help big time
channel.description: I created my own server and logged onto it and everything, but i need major help. If someone could help me make monsters, npcs and equip them with stuff excedera. Is it possible to make your own quests? Also how do you make a spawned npc have health? Everytime i spawn a npc and attack it, it says i did 0 damage and the npc/monster just dies. How can i make it so i can use magic? Also i need help to make it so i can actually go down stairs, open doors, excedera. How can you set the lvl of the skills for someone that starts out? How do you make the place that people start out at, a different place? How can i make objects appear? I need help big time, i am a total noob at this stuff.

item.title: Need help big time
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

Your autospawn.cfg is in your server file.
To change the health, go into npc.cfg and find the ID of the NPC, change the second number to a desired health.
You CANNOT, to this date, equip NPCs.
You’ll need to make cases, replace objects, etc. for doors and stairs.
For the…
How about this.
You have no idea how to make a server.
Ask each question seperatley.

Read full topic
